name: Butter Crab
description:
During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
descriptionraw: During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
storytext:
The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.
"Another helping, please!"
